author: adityapatwardhan
body:
To help debugging applications that use PowerShell SDK, we should add SourceLink metadata to the NuGet SDK. We would also need to publish symbols for the dlls. 

Please see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/library-guidance/sourcelink for more information 

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell

```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Should be able to debug application using PowerShell SDK easily. 
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
SourceLink and PDBs are not available for SDK package.
```

----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell

```
title: Add SourceLink to the metadata of the SDK NuGet package
